example.text: Many have openly embraced these absurd concepts, including the 173 House Democrats who refused to overturn the DC Council and stand up on the side of common sense. Let's not forget the ultimate irony in all of this, which is the fact that for the last 2 years, Democrats were demanding the Senate abolish the legislative filibuster in order to ram through party-line votes on incredibly bad policies, including DC statehood.

The LOCAL Infrastructure Act will help communities stretch dollars further to make upgrades & provide desired services that create economic opportunity and increase longevity. Proud to join [[user]] and a bipartisan group of colleagues on this bill. [[url]]
